    public class Obstacle
extends MovingObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle​(int horizontalVelocity,
                int verticalVelocity,
                int damageDealt,
                int x,
                int y,
                int width,
                int height,
                com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                java.lang.String textureFile)
        Should be used as a super constructor for obstacle types, or as a generic obstacle
        Parameters:
        horizontalVelocity - The horizontal velocity of the obstacle
        verticalVelocity - The vertical velocity of the obstacle
        damageDealt - The damage to be taken from a boat's health on collision
        x - The starting x coordinate
        y - The starting y coordinate
        width - The width of the obstacle
        height - The height of the obstacle
        world - The world to create the obstacle in
        textureFile - The texture/sprite of the obstacle
        See Also:
        Goose, Branch

      • updateMovement

        public void updateMovement()
        Sets a linear velocity using the obstacles horiontal and vertical velocity

      • isOffScreen

        public boolean isOffScreen​(int playerX)
        Function to check if obstacle has left the boundaries of the screen behind the player and returns a boolean result
        Parameters:
        playerX - The x coordinate of the player
        Returns:
        true if obstacle has left the player's view, false otherwise

      • reinstantiate

        public void reinstantiate​(int x,
                          int y)
        Reinstantiate function that takes parameters for position of moved obstacle
        Parameters:
        x - The new x coordinate
        y - The new y coordinate

      • reinstantiate

        public void reinstantiate​(int playerX)
        Reinstantiate function that sets position of obstacle based on position of player
        Parameters:
        playerX - The player's x coordinate
